page.title: 18Motorway M57
page.content:
This Motorway cuts through our sector at its Eastern edge. When it was built a decade ago, it 'clipped' 50 acres from the Knowsley Estate and unfortunately destroyed a Robert Adams designed gatehouse for Knowsley Hall. It joins the North docks of Liverpool and Bootle to the main Trans-Pennine across the country, the M62. Industrial Estates have grown along its edges from North to South, but none of these are located in our sector. A slip-road from the motorway to Stockbridge Village has only recently opened, despite the fact that it was built many years ago.
M.R.Tilling (teacher)
